posts.post_title: T206 Nap Lajoie SGC 3 and T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA 3
posts.post_content: Selling a T206 Nap Lajoie Bat on Shoulder Piedmont SGC 3 and a T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA 3 Sweet Caporal back.  If interested I will send you scans or link to scans.
